name: Take Care, Spring!
description:
This game is still in progress, but the idea was for our Spring Character to launch his head (which had a health bar you took care of), to beat certain puzzles. I'll keep working on this even after the jam is over, I want to use this to pursue more of my actual development practice.

---

Controls:

LEFT/A - Move Left

RIGHT/D - Move Right

Hold DOWN/S - Crouch

Release DOWN/S - Jump

ESC - Pause

---

Credits - Thanks to Joshua McLean for his Royalty Free Music: https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/

---

Game Jam Challenge: Extra Retro
